  2075	
  2076	static void draw_game_over(SDL_Renderer* r, const Game& g) {
  2077	    int board_y = TITLE_H + STATUS_H;
  2078	    int ox=40, oy=board_y+80, ow=BW-80, oh=140;
  2079	    SDL_SetRenderDrawColor(r, 0,0,0,180);
  2080	    SDL_SetRenderDrawBlendMode(r, SDL_BLENDMODE_BLEND);
  2081	    fill_rect(r, ox, oy, ow, oh);
  2082	    SDL_SetRenderDrawBlendMode(r, SDL_BLENDMODE_NONE);
  2083	    set_draw_color(r, {0xf5,0xc8,0x42,0xff});
  2084	    for (int i=0; i<3; i++) draw_rect(r, ox+i, oy+i, ow-2*i, oh-2*i);
  2085	    dtc(r, g_fnt_xl, "GAME OVER", BW/2, oy+38, {0xf5,0xc8,0x42,0xff});
  2086	    dtc(r, g_fnt_lg, g.win_msg.c_str(), BW/2, oy+76, {0xff,0xff,0xff,0xff});
  2087	    dtc(r, g_fnt_md, "Press  NEW GAME  to play again", BW/2, oy+110, {0xaa,0xaa,0x88,0xff});
  2088	}

  2105	// MAIN
  2106	// ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
  2107	
  2108	int main(int argc, char* argv[]) {
  2109	    SDL_SetMainReady();
  2110	    if (SDL_Init(SDL_INIT_VIDEO | SDL_INIT_AUDIO) != 0) {
  2111	        SDL_Log("SDL_Init failed: %s", SDL_GetError());
  2112	        return 1;
  2113	    }
  2114	    if (!(IMG_Init(IMG_INIT_PNG) & IMG_INIT_PNG)) {
  2115	        SDL_Log("IMG_Init failed: %s", IMG_GetError());
  2116	        SDL_Quit(); return 1;
  2117	    }
  2118	    init_fonts();
  2119	    init_audio();
  2120	    init_zobrist();
  2121	
  2122	    SDL_Window* win = SDL_CreateWindow(
  2123	        "Commander Chess -- Co Tu Lenh   [RED=YOU | BLUE=CPU]",
  2124	        SDL_WINDOWPOS_CENTERED, SDL_WINDOWPOS_CENTERED,
  2125	        WIN_W, WIN_H, SDL_WINDOW_SHOWN);
  2126	    if (!win) { SDL_Log("Window failed: %s", SDL_GetError()); return 1; }
  2127	
  2128	    SDL_Renderer* ren = SDL_CreateRenderer(win, -1,
  2129	        SDL_RENDERER_ACCELERATED | SDL_RENDERER_PRESENTVSYNC);
  2130	    if (!ren) { SDL_Log("Renderer failed: %s", SDL_GetError()); return 1; }
  2131	    SDL_SetRenderDrawBlendMode(ren, SDL_BLENDMODE_BLEND);
  2132	
  2133	    load_all_textures(ren);
  2134	    Game game;
  2135	    bool running = true;
  2136	
  2137	    // ── Window layout (absolute coords) ───────────────────────────────────
  2138	    //  y=0               : title bar         (TITLE_H px)
  2139	    //  y=TITLE_H         : status bar        (STATUS_H px)
  2140	    //  y=TITLE_H+STATUS_H: board             (BH px, x=0..BW)
  2141	    //  x=BW              : side panel        (PANEL_W px, full height)
  2142	    // No separate bottom button bar — buttons live at bottom of panel
  2143	
  2144	    int board_top = TITLE_H + STATUS_H;
  2145	
  2146	    // Clickable buttons
  2147	    // "New Game" and "Quit" sit at the very bottom of the panel
  2148	    int btn_y  = WIN_H - 38;
  2149	    int btn_w  = (PANEL_W - 24) / 2;
  2150	
  2151	    // Difficulty radio-button hit areas (inside panel)
  2152	    // These are handled by checking proximity to the radio buttons drawn by draw_panel
  2153	    // Simpler: define 3 wide hit-rects spanning where the text labels are
  2154	    int diff_y = TITLE_H + 8 + 16 + 18;  // matches draw_panel layout
  2155	    int rbx0 = BW + 10;
  2156	
  2157	    std::vector<Button> buttons = {
  2158	        // New Game button (bottom of panel, left half)
  2159	        {{BW+8,   btn_y, btn_w, 30}, "New Game", [&](){ game.new_game(); }},
  2160	        // Quit button (bottom of panel, right half)
  2161	        {{BW+8+btn_w+8, btn_y, btn_w, 30}, "Quit", [&](){ running=false; }},
  2162	        // Difficulty — wide tap targets
  2163	        {{rbx0,      diff_y, 50, 16}, "Easy",   [&](){ game.set_difficulty(0); }},
  2164	        {{rbx0+56,   diff_y, 62, 16}, "Medium", [&](){ game.set_difficulty(1); }},
  2165	        {{rbx0+118,  diff_y, 52, 16}, "Hard",   [&](){ game.set_difficulty(2); }},
  2166	    };
  2167	
  2168	    SDL_Event ev;
  2169	    while (running) {
  2170	        while (SDL_PollEvent(&ev)) {
  2171	            if (ev.type == SDL_QUIT) running = false;
  2172	            else if (ev.type == SDL_MOUSEBUTTONDOWN && ev.button.button == SDL_BUTTON_LEFT) {
  2173	                int mx=ev.button.x, my=ev.button.y;
  2174	                bool hit = false;
  2175	                for (auto& b : buttons) {
  2176	                    if (mx>=b.rect.x && mx<b.rect.x+b.rect.w &&
  2177	                        my>=b.rect.y && my<b.rect.y+b.rect.h) {
  2178	                        b.action(); hit=true; break;
  2179	                    }
  2180	                }
  2181	                // Board click — translate to board-local coords
  2182	                if (!hit && mx<BW && my>=board_top && my<board_top+BH)
  2183	                    game.on_click(mx, my - board_top);
  2184	            }
  2185	        }
  2186	        game.check_cpu_done();
  2187	
  2188	        // ── Render ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
  2189	        set_draw_color(ren, C_BG);
  2190	        SDL_RenderClear(ren);
  2191	
  2192	        // Title
  2193	        draw_title(ren);
  2194	        // Status bar
  2195	        draw_status(ren, game);
  2196	        // Board (in viewport so cx/cy work in board-local coords)
  2197	        {
  2198	            SDL_Rect vp = {0, board_top, BW, BH};
  2199	            SDL_RenderSetViewport(ren, &vp);
  2200	            draw_board(ren);
  2201	            draw_highlights(ren, game);
  2202	            draw_pieces(ren, game);
  2203	            SDL_RenderSetViewport(ren, nullptr);
  2204	        }
  2205	        // Side panel
  2206	        draw_panel(ren, game);
  2207	        // New Game / Quit buttons at bottom of panel
  2208	        draw_button(ren, buttons[0].rect.x, buttons[0].rect.y,
  2209	                         buttons[0].rect.w, buttons[0].rect.h,
  2210	                         "New Game", {0xf5,0xc8,0x42,0xff});
  2211	        draw_button(ren, buttons[1].rect.x, buttons[1].rect.y,
  2212	                         buttons[1].rect.w, buttons[1].rect.h,
  2213	                         "Quit", {0xff,0x88,0x66,0xff});
  2214	        // Game-over overlay
  2215	        if (game.state == GameState::GAME_OVER)
  2216	            draw_game_over(ren, game);
  2217	
  2218	        SDL_RenderPresent(ren);
  2219	        SDL_Delay(16);
  2220	    }
  2221	
  2222	    // Cleanup
  2223	    for (auto& kv : g_textures)       SDL_DestroyTexture(kv.second);
  2224	    for (auto& kv : g_textures_small) SDL_DestroyTexture(kv.second);
  2225	    if (g_audio_dev) SDL_CloseAudioDevice(g_audio_dev);
  2226	    if (g_fnt_sm)   TTF_CloseFont(g_fnt_sm);
  2227	    if (g_fnt_md)   TTF_CloseFont(g_fnt_md);
  2228	    if (g_fnt_lg)   TTF_CloseFont(g_fnt_lg);
  2229	    if (g_fnt_xl)   TTF_CloseFont(g_fnt_xl);
  2230	    if (g_fnt_btn)  TTF_CloseFont(g_fnt_btn);
  2231	    if (g_fnt_head) TTF_CloseFont(g_fnt_head);
  2232	    TTF_Quit();
  2233	    SDL_DestroyRenderer(ren);
  2234	    SDL_DestroyWindow(win);
  2235	    IMG_Quit();
  2236	    SDL_Quit();
  2237	    return 0;
  2238	}
